title: Improve Fragment Handling and State Saving
message:
Improve Fragment Handling and State Saving

Fragments are not kept in memory any longer. They are added to the back
stack and their views are recreated when they are selected again.

For this, all instance states are now properly saved. This should
improve memory usage and provide consistent user experience when
changing configurations such as rotation or multi-window mode.

The location input and the date/time buttons have been refactored into
compound views that keep track of their own state. The MainActivity has
been improved a lot and its drawer now keeps track of its own state.

message:
Added logo for Melbourne, Victoria ("Public Transport Victoria").

There are multiple different organisations, one for urban trains
(Metro Melbourne) and one regional trains (V-Line), one for trams
(Yarra Trams), and probably multiple for buses. However, they are
all under the guise of one government agency, called "Public Transport
Victoria" (PTV). This is also where the API that provides details
of route planning comes from.

The logo is based on the one from http://ptv.vic.gov.au.
